publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8085 James Kelly: The Criminal Legal Aid (Fixed Payments) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2011—That the Justice Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Criminal Legal Aid (Fixed Payments) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2011 (SSI2011/162).
